abstract: Laurel Graeber reviews play Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer: The Musical, adapted from 1964 animated television special by Bob Penola, at Theater at Madison Square Garden; Dana Solimando directs and Sarah Errington stars.

keywords.value: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer: The Musical (Play)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: “Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer: The Musical,” at the Theater at Madison Square Garden, has bucks as well as does, but its message of equality is not fully realized.
snippet: “Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer: The Musical,” at the Theater at Madison Square Garden, has bucks as well as does, but its message of equality is not fully realized....

headline.main: Review: A ‘Rudolph’ for Inclusion (at Least if You’re a Guy)
headline.print_headline: A Red Nose Lights an Uneven Field
